REVIEW.TITLE: Reviews
REVIEW.REVIEW1: EliasDH transformed our online presence completely. Their hosting is rock-solid and the website they built exceeded all our expectations. Highly recommended!
REVIEW.REVIEW2: Professional, responsive, and incredibly talented team. They delivered our web application on time and the performance is outstanding. A pleasure to work with!
REVIEW.REVIEW3: We switched to EliasDH for hosting and couldn't be happier. Zero downtime, lightning-fast speeds, and their support team is always there when we need them.
REVIEW.REVIEW4: Great experience from start to finish. They understood our vision and created a beautiful website that truly represents our brand. Very satisfied!
REVIEW.REVIEW5: The team at EliasDH is exceptional. They not only built our platform but also provided valuable insights that helped improve our business processes.
REVIEW.REVIEW6: Outstanding service and expertise. Our website traffic has doubled since launching with EliasDH. Their SEO-friendly approach really makes a difference.

FAQ.TITLE: FAQ
FAQ.QUESTION1: What makes EliasDH different from other hosting providers?
FAQ.ANSWER1: We don't just host your website – we build it, optimize it, and keep it running at peak performance. Our all-in-one approach means you get a dedicated team that knows your project inside and out, with personalized support and custom solutions tailored to your business needs.
FAQ.QUESTION2: How long does it take to build a website?
FAQ.ANSWER2: Depending on complexity, a basic website takes 2-4 weeks, while more advanced web applications can take 6-12 weeks. We work in sprints and keep you updated throughout the process, so you'll always know exactly where your project stands.
FAQ.QUESTION3: Do I need technical knowledge to manage my website?
FAQ.ANSWER3: Not at all! We design everything with user-friendliness in mind. Plus, we provide training and documentation so you can easily update content, manage bookings, or make basic changes yourself. For anything more complex, our team is just a message away.
FAQ.QUESTION4: What happens if my website goes down?
FAQ.ANSWER4: Our infrastructure is built for reliability with 99.9% uptime guarantees. In the rare event of an issue, our monitoring systems alert us immediately and our team responds within minutes – often before you even notice there's a problem.
FAQ.QUESTION5: Can I upgrade my hosting plan later?
FAQ.ANSWER5: Absolutely! All our plans are designed to scale with your business. Upgrading is seamless and we'll migrate everything for you without any downtime. Many of our clients start with the Basic plan and grow into Enterprise as their traffic increases.
FAQ.QUESTION6: Do you offer ongoing support and maintenance?
FAQ.ANSWER6: Yes! Every hosting plan includes ongoing technical support, security updates, and regular backups. We also offer additional maintenance packages for content updates, feature additions, and performance optimization to keep your site running smoothly.

INDEX.TRANSLATE1: Hi there, welcome to our company
INDEX.TRANSLATE6: EliasDH was founded in 2026 with a clear mission: to empower businesses and individuals by providing top-notch hosting services and cutting-edge web development solutions. We believe that technology should be accessible to everyone, and our goal is to make the online world more secure, efficient, and user-friendly.
INDEX.TRANSLATE7: At EliasDH, we are committed to excellence in everything we do. From crafting custom websites to optimizing server performance, we go above and beyond to exceed our clients' expectations. Our team of dedicated professionals works tirelessly to stay ahead of the curve and deliver innovative solutions that drive real results.
INDEX.TRANSLATE9: Customer Satisfaction: Our customers are our top priority. We strive to build lasting relationships based on trust, transparency, and exceptional service.
INDEX.TRANSLATE10: Innovation: Innovation is at the heart of our company. We are constantly pushing boundaries and exploring new technologies to stay ahead of the curve.
INDEX.TRANSLATE11: Team Collaboration: We believe in the power of collaboration. By fostering a culture of teamwork and open communication, we achieve great things together.
INDEX.TRANSLATE12: Continuous Improvement: We are committed to continuous improvement. We embrace feedback, learn from our experiences, and adapt to evolving industry trends.
INDEX.TRANSLATE15-DESC: After we build your website or web application, we keep it running smoothly with our hosting packages. Choose the plan that fits your needs.
INDEX.TRANSLATE36-DESC: We build custom websites and web applications tailored to your needs. From simple landing pages to complex platforms.
INDEX.TRANSLATE38: We create responsive websites that look good on all devices.
INDEX.TRANSLATE40: We specialize in building secure and lightning-fast backend systems.
INDEX.TRANSLATE42: We create full stack applications that are fast, secure, and responsive.
INDEX.TRANSLATE46: Are you passionate about making a difference? Do you thrive in a dynamic and collaborative environment? We're always on the lookout for talented individuals to join our team!
INDEX.TRANSLATE47: If you're interested in becoming a part of our team, we'd love to hear from you. Please send us your resume and a motivation letter outlining why you'd be a great fit for our organization.
INDEX.TRANSLATE48: Feel free to reach out to us with any questions or inquiries. We look forward to connecting with you!

PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE5-1: EliasDH is committed to safeguarding your privacy. Contact us at
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE5-2: if you have any questions or problems regarding the use of your Personal Data and we will gladly assist you.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE6: By using this site or/and our services, you consent to the Processing of your Personal Data as described in this Privacy Policy.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE8: We promise to follow the following data protection principles:
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE9: Processing is lawful, fair, transparent. Our Processing activities have lawful grounds. We always consider your rights before Processing Personal Data. We will provide you information regarding Processing upon request.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE10: Processing is limited to the purpose. Our Processing activities fit the purpose for which Personal Data was gathered.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE11: Processing is done with minimal data. We only gather and Process the minimal amount of Personal Data required for any purpose.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE12: Processing is limited to a time period. We will not store your personal data for longer than needed.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE13: We will do our best to ensure the accuracy of the data.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE14: We will do our best to ensure the integrity and confidentiality of data.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE16: The Data Subject has the following rights:
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE17: Right to information - meaning you have the right to know whether your Personal Data is being processed; what data is gathered, from where it is obtained, and why and by whom it is processed.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE18: Right to access - meaning you have the right to access the data collected from/about you. This includes your right to request and obtain a copy of your Personal Data gathered.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE19: Right to rectification - meaning you have the right to request rectification or erasure of your Personal Data that is inaccurate or incomplete.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE20: Right to erasure - meaning in certain circumstances you can request for your Personal Data to be erased from our records.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE21: Right to restrict processing - meaning where certain conditions apply, you have the right to restrict the Processing of your Personal Data.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE22: Right to object to processing - meaning in certain cases you have the right to object to Processing of your Personal Data, for example in the case of direct marketing.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE23: Right to object to automated Processing - meaning you have the right to object to automated Processing, including profiling; and not to be subject to a decision based solely on automated Processing. This right you can exercise whenever there is an outcome of the profiling that produces legal effects concerning or significantly affecting you.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE24: Right to data portability - you have the right to obtain your Personal Data in a machine-readable format or if it is feasible, as a direct transfer from one Processor to another.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE25: Right to complain - if we refuse your request under the Rights of Access, we will provide you with a reason as to why. If you are not satisfied with the way your request has been handled please contact us.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE26: Right for the help of supervisory authority - meaning you have the right for the help of a supervisory authority and the right for other legal remedies such as claiming damages.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE27: Right to withdraw consent - you have the right to withdraw any given consent for Processing your Personal Data.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE29: Information you have provided us with. This might be your e-mail address, name, billing address, home address, etc - mainly information that is necessary for delivering you a product/service or to enhance your customer experience with us. We save the information you provide us with for you to comment or perform other activities on the website. This information includes, for example, your name and e-mail address.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE30: Information automatically collected about you. This includes information that is automatically stored by cookies and other session tools. For example, your name, email address, site URL, IP address, and user agent. This information is used to improve the customer experience. When you use our services or look at the contents of our website, your activities may be logged.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE31: Publicly available information. We might gather information about you that is publicly available.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE33: We do our best to keep your Personal Data safe. We use safe protocols for communication and transferring data (such as HTTPS). We use anonymizing and pseudonymizing where suitable. We monitor our systems for possible vulnerabilities and attacks.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE34: Even though we try our best we can not guarantee the security of information. However, we promise to notify the suitable authorities of data breaches. We will also notify you if there is a threat to your rights or interests. We will do everything we reasonably can to prevent security breaches and to assist authorities should any breaches occur.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE35: If you have an account with us, note that you have to keep your username and password secret.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE36: Cookies and other technologies we use
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE37: We use cookies and/or similar technologies to analyze customer behavior, administer the website, track users' movements, and collect information about users. This is done to personalize and enhance your experience with us.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE38: A cookie is a tiny text file stored on your computer. Cookies store information that is used to help make sites work. Only we can access the cookies created by our website. You can control your cookies at the browser level. Choosing to disable cookies may hinder your use of certain functions.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE39: We use cookies for the following purposes:
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE40: Necessary cookies - These cookies are required for you to be able to use some important features on our website, such as logging in. These cookies don't collect any personal information.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE41: Functionality cookies - These cookies provide functionality that makes using our service more convenient and makes providing more personalized features possible. For example, they might remember your name and e-mail in comment forms so you don't have to re-enter this information next time when commenting.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE42: Analytics cookies - These cookies are used to track the use and performance of our website and services.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE43: Advertising cookies - These cookies are used to deliver advertisements that are relevant to you and your interests. In addition, they are used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement. They are usually placed on the website by advertising networks with the website operator's permission. These cookies remember that you have visited a website and this information is shared with other organizations such as advertisers. Often targeting or advertising cookies will be linked to site functionality provided by the other organization.
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE44-1: You can remove cookies stored on your computer via your browser settings. Alternatively, you can control some 3rd party cookies by using a privacy enhancement platform such as
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE44-3: For more information about cookies, visit
PRIVACYPOLICY.TRANSLATE46: We reserve the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy.
